name: The United States
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead the United States to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: Prepare to be liberated!!
attacked: We will remember this, this attack on the western world..!
defeated: It is over. Perhaps now I shall have peace, at last.
introduction: Welcome to the United States of America!
tradeRequest: It appears that you do have a reason for existing – to make this deal with me.
declaringFriendship: I offer this friendship from the west.

name: Russia
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Russia to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: You've behaved yourself very badly, you know it. Now it's payback time.
attacked: If you Western Imperialist want war, then come fight us, we'll be waiting with parade uniforms!
defeated: We were defeated, so comes the collapse of Russia. I suppose there are no worse fates...
denounced: Shut up, I do not care...
tradeRequest: How would you like it if I propose this kind of exchange?
declaringFriendship: I am happy to allow you into the CSTO, a friendship between our nations. Do you accept?

name: China
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead China to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: I will destroy who ever wants to devide the people of China!
attacked: Fools think they can take down China?
defeated: China may have fallen, but the people will never accept defeat.
introduction: Welcome to the People's Republic of China.
tradeRequest: My friend, do you think you can accept this request?
declaringFriendship: We are building a coalition of like-minded people. Shall you take part?

name: Germany
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Germany to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: I cannot wait until ye grow even mightier. Therefore, prepare for war!
attacked: Corrupted villain! We will bring you into the ground!
defeated: Germany has been destroyed once again. I weep for the future generations.
introduction: Welcome to the Federal Republic of Germany.
tradeRequest: It would be in your best interest, to carefully consider this proposal.
declaringFriendship: Let us be companions! So long as we do not have to meet often. And you will have to wear a mask.

name: The United Kingdom
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Britian to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: By the grace of God, your days are numbered.
attacked: We shall never surrender.
defeated: You have triumphed over us. The day is yours.
introduction: Welcome to the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland!
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in a trade agreement with Britian?
declaringFriendship: We are pleased to consider you an esteemed friend. We hope the feeling is mutual...

name: Iran
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Iran to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: The Allah stands with us, while you stand alone...
attacked: Curse you! You are beneath me, son of a driver! I will crush you!
defeated: You mongrel! Cursed be you! The world will long lament your heinous crime!
introduction: Welcome to the Islamic Republic of Iran.
tradeRequest: In my endless magnanimity, I am making you this offer. You agree, of course?
declaringFriendship: We must unite in friendship, lest we be destroyed in division.

name: Brazil
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Brasil to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: God will probably forgive you... but I shall not. Prepare for war.
attacked: You don't come for Brasil... Brasil comes for you!!
defeated: Brazil will go down in history as the strongest nation in South America..!
introduction: Welcome to the Federative Republic of Brasil.
tradeRequest: I hope this deal will receive your blessing.

name: Japan
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Japan to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: I wish not to do this, but you leave us with no choice..!
attacked: We would never surrender our homeland to you, so we must fight!
defeated: You were much wiser than I thought.
denounced: Alright then. I trust you've thought it through.
introduction: Welcome to Japan, I hope you enjoy your stay!
tradeRequest: I would be grateful if you agreed on the following proposal.

name: India
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead India to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: I have just received a report that large numbers of my troops have crossed your borders.
attacked: My attempts to avoid violence have failed. An eye for an eye only makes the world blind.
defeated: You can chain me, you can torture me, you can even destroy this body, but you will never imprison my mind.
tradeRequest: My friend, are you interested in this arrangement?
declaringFriendship: There is no shame in deterrence. Having a weapon is very different from actually using it.

name: Turkiye
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Turkey to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: Your continued insolence and failure to recognize our preeminence leads us to war.
attacked: Good. The world shall witness the incontestable might of my armies and the glory of our nation.
defeated: Ruin! Ruin! Ankara becomes Iram of the Pillars, remembered only by the melancholy poets.
introduction: Welcome to the Republic of Türkiye. Bugün nasılsın?
tradeRequest: Let us do business! Would you be interested?

name: Indonesia
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Indonesia to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: Before this war ends, you will know the fury of a thousand battleships.
attacked: Truly? Didn't you know the Indonesian navy puts monsoons to shame? Soon you will.
defeated: You may win, but you cannot win upon my spirit.
denounced: You call that an insult? A pathetic attempt from a crusted barnacle!
introduction: Welcome to the Republic of Indonesia.
tradeRequest: What if we make a deal, you and me?
declaringFriendship: There is no shame in deterrence. Having a weapon is very different from actually using it.

name: Nigeria
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Nigeria to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: Your ingnorance of where our borders lay is a sign of agression, so we must got to war.
attacked: Enough! My forbearance ends here! We must have war between us, instead of a false peace.
defeated: Wealth is fleeting; learning is vanity. All I have done, God, I did in your name.
denounced: What you say is completely wrong of our reality, you are the one to be judged...
introduction: Welcome to the Federal Republic of Nigeria!
tradeRequest: We always have time to trade, now is a great time!
uniqueName: Unity and Faith, Peace and Progress

name: Poland
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Poland to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: I must protect the interests of Poland. Surrender quickly so that this may end without bloodshed...
attacked: My armies will grind you to dust!
defeated: Poland is not yet lost..!
introduction: Welcome to the Republic of Poland. Care for some vodka?
hateHello: What are you looking for here?
tradeRequest: How do you like my offer?

name: Spain
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Spain to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: God will probably forgive you... but I shall not. Prepare for war.
attacked: Repugnant spawn of the devil! You will pay!
defeated: If my defeat is, without any doubt, the will of God, then I will accept it.
denounced: Your words are terrible! Who comes up with such lies?
introduction: Welcome to the Kingdom of Spain!
tradeRequest: I hope this deal will receive your blessing.

name: South Africa
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead South Africa to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: You annoy us... prepare to be invaded.
attacked: Your war won't solve anything..!
defeated: What happened to our nation of South Africa? What could have done this...
introduction: Welcome to the Republic of South Africa.
tradeRequest: We'll trade our goods, as long as its a good trade. Ha! ...get it?

name: Saudi Arabia
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Saudi Arabia to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: I promise none of us will taste peace, until you concede.
attacked: It's shameful that we turn to violence, for it is not the behaviour of kings to kill each other..!
defeated: This is not victory. Victory is changing the hearts of your opponents, through gentleness, through kindness...
denounced: Everyone is critical of the flaws of others, but blind to their own.
introduction: As-salamu alaykum, Welcome to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
uniqueName: Lā ilāha illa allāh, Muḥammadun rasūlu allāh

name: Thailand
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Thailand to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: You lowly, arrogant fool! I will make you regret of your insolence!
attacked: You scoundrel! I shall prepare to fend you off!
defeated: Although I lost, my honor shall endure. I wish you good luck.
introduction: Welcome to the Kingdom of Thailand.
tradeRequest: Greetings. I believe this is a fair proposal for both parties. What do you think?

name: France
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead France to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: You're disturbing us, prepare for war.
attacked: You dare attack my sovereign nation? I don't believe even Napoleon could have predicted this!
defeated: I have lived long enough to know when I am defeated. Carry on.
denounced: The glory and might of France will not be tarnished by such obvious lies.
tradeRequest: The French Republic offers you this exceptional proposition.

name: Australia
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Australia to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: After thorough deliberation, Australia finds itself at a crossroads. Prepare yourself, war is upon us.
attacked: We will mobilize every means of resistance to stop this transgression against our nation!
defeated: The principles for which we have fought will survive longer than any nation you could ever build.
denounced: Your slander of Australia and her people will be known far and wide when your enfeebled nation crumbles!
introduction: Welcome to the Commonwealth of Australia.
tradeRequest: Australia offers you this exceptional proposition.

name: Belgium
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: I guess you weren't here for the sprouts after all...

name: Afghanistan
declaringWar: Allahu akbar!
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Unacceptable!

name: Finland
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Tonight, the snow speaks Finnish...
defeated: The day of judgement has come to us. But rest assured, the same will go for you!

name: Philippines
declaringWar: You must shatter the vase to spread its perfume, and smite the rock to get the spark.
attacked: We do not sleep; we wait for you with fire in our hearts and weapons in our hands.
defeated: Consummatum est...

name: Somalia
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Congratulations, conqueror. This nation serves you now.

name: Singapore
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Perhaps, in another world, we could have been friends...

name: Lebanon
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Tanzania
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: May the Heavens forgive you for inflicting this humiliation to our people.

name: Kazakhstan
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!

name: Argentina
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!

name: Zimbabwe
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could you..?

name: New Zealand
declaringWar: After thorough deliberation, New Zealand finds itself at a crossroads. Prepare yourself, for war is upon us.
attacked: We will mobilize every means of resistance to stop this transgression against our nation!
defeated: The principles for which we have fought will survive longer than any nation you could ever build.

name: Qatar
declaringWar: I will enjoy hearing your last breath as you witness the destruction of your country!
attacked: Why do we fight? Because Allah demands it. Now, witness the power of Qatar!
defeated: What treachery has struck us? No, what evil?

name: Canada
declaringWar: In responding to the unstinting malignancy that has heretofore defined your relationship with Canada, we can have no recourse but war!
attacked: As we can reach no peaceful resolution with you, Canada must turn, with reluctance, to war.
defeated: I regret not defending my country to the last, although it was not of use.

name: Mexico
declaringWar: First comes the homeland, therefore you must not be in my way.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: I regret not defending my country to the last, although it was not of use.

name: Portugal
declaringWar: I have declared war against you. I did not want to do this, but I don't want you around anymore, either.
attacked: What have I done to offend you so? Oh well, it is too late to fix this mistake. How regrettable, that we must go to war.
defeated: I am told that you are the conqueror of Portugal. That may be the reality, but I will never recognize your victory. Begone!

name: Greece
declaringWar: This is for the greater good. You will understand...in time.
attacked: Soldiers are not like trees. When they are destroyed, they are not so easily replaced...
defeated: You may have defeated us, but what we leave behind is woven into the lives of others.

name: Vietnam
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: So this is how it feels to die...
